general: Today, the stars align to offer Leos a day full of creativity and personal expression. The passage of Venus favors social interactions, while the Sun illuminates your path, encouraging you to shine and take bold initiatives.
love: Express your feelings freely, it will strengthen your bond.
work: Do not hesitate to share your innovative ideas, they will be well received.
health: Take the time to relax, meditation can bring balance.
advice: Dare to be yourself, your authenticity is your strength.
